label: System Roles
name: system_roles

name.name: Name
name.description: This is the name of the property that is stored in the database, this is simliar to column name of a table.

placeholder.name: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Placeholder in the input to guide users when entering the data

description.name: Description
description.description: Description of the input to give details about the input

required.name: Required
required.description: If selected, user must entered the input value

unique.name: No Duplicate
unique.description: If selected, this input will be checked before the form submitted

encrypted.name: Encrypted
encrypted.description: If selected, this input will encrypted in database.Please be advice encrypted value cannot be queried

adminOnly.name: Admin Only
adminOnly.description: If selected, this input will only visible for admin only.

minChars.name: Minimum Characters
minChars.description: If selected, minimum characters validation will be triggered before the form submitted

maxChars.name: Maximum Characters
maxChars.description: If selected, maximum characters validation will be triggered before the form submitted

pattern.name: Pattern
pattern.description: If set, Regex pattern validation will be triggered before the form submitted

validator.name: Validator : (data,form) => return
validator.description: A Javascript function to perform advance validation, promise return is accepted, please return following format {success:false,errorMessage:"validation message to display"}
